definition.name: NameToFileMapping
assignmentAttribute
definition.description: Name of attribute containing Entitlement values

definition.name: csvFile
definition.description: Path to csv file on local system

definition.name: multivalued
definition.description: Can multiple values be assigned for this entitlement? ('true' or 'false')

xlfid(NOVLADENTEX.idmresource.PermissionNameToFilePrompt.gcv.dscr.NameToFileMapping)Add a value for each entitlement and assignment attribute, and specify the associated CSV file by selecting the '+' button.
